privacyContactText: If you have questions about our privacy policy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us:
privacySection1Text1: M Le Diamant Beauty Lounge ("We", "Our", "Salon") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacySection1Text2: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.
privacySection2List1: Personal information: name, email address, phone number
privacySection2List2: Booking information: date and time of visit, selected services
privacySection2List3: Usage data: information about how you interact with our website
privacySection2List4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system
privacySection2List5: Medical information: allergies, contraindications (only with your consent)
privacySection2Text: We may collect the following types of information:
privacySection3List3: Communicating with you about your visits and services
privacySection3List4: Improving the quality of our services
privacySection3List5: Sending marketing communications (only with your consent)
privacySection3Text: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
privacySection4Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
privacySection5Text: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except when necessary to provide our services (e.g., payment processing partners) or required by UAE law.
privacySection6Text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacySection7Text: Our website uses cookies to improve your user experience. You can manage cookie settings through your browser.
privacySection8Text: We may periodically update this privacy policy. The updated version will be posted on this page with the date of the last update.

termsContactText: If you have questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:
termsSection10Text: These Terms of Use are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
termsSection1Text: Welcome to M Le Diamant Beauty Lounge website. By using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our website.
termsSection2Text: M Le Diamant provides premium beauty salon services, including but not limited to:
termsSection3Text1: You can book services through our website, by phone, or in person at the salon. All bookings are subject to confirmation.
termsSection3Text2: Some services may require a deposit at the time of booking.
termsSection3Text3: Payment is made after the services are rendered. We accept cash and credit cards.
termsSection3Text4: All prices are in UAE Dirhams (AED). We reserve the right to change prices without prior notice.
termsSection4Text1: You can cancel or modify your booking at least 24 hours before the scheduled time without penalty.
termsSection4Text2: If cancelled less than 24 hours in advance or in case of no-show, the deposit (if paid) is non-refundable.
termsSection4Text3: If you are more than 15 minutes late, we reserve the right to cancel the booking or shorten the procedure time.
termsSection5List1: Follow salon rules and communicate politely with staff
termsSection5List2: Provide accurate health and allergy information
termsSection5List3: Inform about any contraindications to procedures
termsSection5List5: Arrive for procedures in a sober state
termsSection6Text1: Our services are not medical. If you have medical indications, consult a doctor.
termsSection6Text2: The client is responsible for providing information about any allergies. We are not responsible for reactions we were not informed about.
termsSection6Text3: Results of procedures may vary depending on individual characteristics. We do not guarantee specific results.
termsSection6Text4: We are not responsible for loss or damage to personal belongings of the client.
termsSection7Text1: Gift certificates are valid for 12 months from the date of purchase.
termsSection7Text2: Gift certificates are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash.
termsSection7Text3: Gift certificates can be transferred to another person.
termsSection8Text: All materials on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the property of M Le Diamant and are protected by UAE copyright and trademark laws.
termsSection9Text: M Le Diamant reserves the right to change these Terms of Use at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website.
testimonialsDesc: We value the trust of every client and are proud of positive reviews
